column3: O Lord! In the multitude of thy strength thy enemies shall lie to thee.

1 ^ Shout with joy to God: 4 ^ Let all the earth adore thee
all the earth~;: and sing to thee~; let it say a psalm to thy name."

1 ^ Shout with joy to God: 5 ^ Come and see the works of God~; terrible in his counsels over the sons of men.
6 ^ Who turneth the sea into dry land~; in the river they shall pass on foot~; there shall we rejoice in him.
7 ^ Who by his power ruleth for ever~; his eyes behold the nations~; let not them that provoke him be exalted in themselves.

column3: and make the voice of his praise to be heard

all the earth~;: and hath not suffered my feet to be moved.

12 ^ Thou hast set men over our heads. We have passed through fire and water
all the earth~;: and thou hast brought us out into a refreshment.

all the earth~;: and my mouth hath spoken when I was in trouble.
